C-SAMBA Events

06/28/2017

Window to the Brain research presentation (talk/poster) at the UC System Bioengineering Symposium. Los Angeles, CA.

Corber SR, Ashby DZ, Khandan O, Cuando N, Aguilar G, Rao MP. "Progress towards the Fabrication of Hollow, Out-of-Plane, Titanium Microneedles for Transdermal Delivery of Optical Clearing Agents"

06/28/2017

Window to the Brain research presentation (talk) at European Conferences on Biomedical Optics, Munich, Germany.

Cuando-Espitia N, Luna-Palacios Y, Alvarez C, Aguilar G, Camacho-Lopez S, Halaney DL. “Femtosecond laser assisted antibacterial activity of ZnO nanoparticles.”

05/11/2017

Window to the Brain research presentation (talk) at Eta Kappa Nu (IEEE honor society) - Sigma Lamba chapter meeting, Riverside, CA.

Corber SR, Ashby DZ, Khandan O, Cuando N, Aguilar G, Rao MP. "Fabrication of Microneedles for Enhanced Optical Clearing of Tissues."

04/20/2017

Window to the Brain research presentation (poster) at the Material Research Society Spring Meeting, Pheonix, AZ.

Corber SR, Ashby DZ, Khandan O, Cuando N, Aguilar G, Rao MP. "Progress towards the Fabrication of Hollow, Out-of-Plane, Titanium Microneedles for Transdermal Delivery of Optical Clearing Agents."

04/07/2017

Window to the Brain research presentation (talk) at the American Society of Laser Medicine and Surgery (ASLMS) Annual Conference, San Diego, CA.

Zamora-Romero N, Aguilar G, Devia-Cruz LF, Halaney D, Alvarez-Barragan A, Mangolini L. “Pulsed and CW laser irradiation effects of TiN nanoparticles on cancer cells in vitro.”

01/30/2017

Window to the Brain research presentation (talk) at SPIE BiOS, San Francisco, CA.

Window to the Brain research presentation (talk) at SPIE BiOS, San Francisco, CA.

08/24/2016

Window to the Brain research presentation at the OSA Latin America Optics & Photonics (LAOP) Conference

Pimentel-Dominguez R, Hernandez-Cordero J. "Fabrication and applications of optical fiber micro-heaters." OSA Latin America Optics & Photonics Conference, Medellin, Colombia (2016).

05/30/2016

Window to the Brain research presentation at the Summer Biomechanics, Bioengineering and Biotransport (SB3C) Conference

Halaney DL, Damestani Y, De Howitt N, Garay JE, Camacho-López S, Aguilar G. “Evaluation of laser bacterial anti-fouling of transparent nanocrystalline yttria-stabilized-zirconia cranial implant.” Summer Biomechanics, Bioengineering and Biotransport Conference, National Harbor, MD (2016).

03/05/2016

MESA Day Project Competition: Volunteer Opportunity

The MESA Day Competitions are science and engineering events for middle and high school students that focus on student team projects. Hundreds of middle and high school students come to campus and compete in various competitions, from bridge building to math competitions to speech competitions. Volunteers are needed to do everything from judging competitions, to helping greet and host students.

02/20/2016

MESA Day Project Competition: Volunteer Opportunity

The MESA Day Competitions are science and engineering events for middle and high school students that focus on student team projects. Hundreds of middle and high school students come to campus and compete in various competitions, from bridge building to math competitions to speech competitions. Volunteers are needed to do everything from judging competitions, to helping greet and host students.
